00012 GameOverState::GameOverState() {
00013         this->background = IMG_Load(Setting::BACKGROUND.c_str());
00014         if (!this->background) {
00015                 cerr << "Image could not load!";
00016         }
00017 
00018         // Read highscore
00019         ifstream openFile(Setting::HIGHSCORE.c_str());
00020         string line;
00021         while (!openFile.eof()) {
00022                 getline(openFile, line);
00023                 size_t findPos = line.find_last_of(',');
00024                 stringstream ss(line.substr(findPos + 1));
00025                 ss >> this->lowestPoints;
00026         }
00027         openFile.close();
00028 
00029         this->saveName = "";
00030 }
00031 
00032 GameOverState::~GameOverState() {
00033         if (NULL != this->background) {
00034                 SDL_FreeSurface(this->background);
00035                 this->background = NULL;
00036         }
00037 }

00039 void GameOverState::draw(SDL_Surface* surface) {
00040 
00041         if (!this->reDraw) {
00042                 return;
00043         }
00044 
00045         SDL_Rect rect;
00046         rect.x = 0;
00047         rect.y = 0;
00048         SDL_BlitSurface(this->background, NULL, surface, &rect);
00049         // white
00050         SDL_Color whiteColor = { 255, 255, 255, 0 };
00051 
00052         // input color , red
00053         SDL_Color inputColor = { 159, 16, 16, 0 };
00054 
00055         // Victorious , gold
00056         SDL_Color victoriousColor = { 218, 189, 52, 0 };
00057 
00058         if (this->round == Setting::ROUNDS) {
00059                 Draw::text(surface, "Victorious", victoriousColor, 100, 60, 90);
00060         } else {
00061                 Draw::text(surface, "Game Over", whiteColor, 100, 60, 90);
00062         }
00063         if (this->myScore != -1) {
00064                 Draw::text(surface, "Your score: " + AbstractGameState::intToString(
00065                                 this->myScore), whiteColor, 100, 150, 40);
00066         }
00067         if (this->myScore > this->lowestPoints) {
00068                 // Ask users name
00069                 Draw::text(surface, "Enter your name", whiteColor, 100, 200, 90);
00070                 Draw::text(surface, this->saveName, inputColor, 100, 300, 60);
00071                 Draw::text(surface, "Save", whiteColor, 100, 400, 90);
00072         } else {
00073                 // Print out menu
00074                 Draw::text(surface, "Play Again", whiteColor, 100, 400, 90);
00075                 Draw::text(surface, "Go to Startmenu", whiteColor, 100, 500, 90);
00076 
00077                 Draw::text(surface, "Highscore list", whiteColor, 650, 200);
00078 
00079                 // background for highscore
00080                 boxRGBA(surface, 520, 180, 950, 450, 0, 0, 0, 100);
00081                 // Print out highscore
00082                 ifstream openFile(Setting::HIGHSCORE.c_str());
00083                 string line;
00084                 int posY = 250;
00085                 while (!openFile.eof()) {
00086                         getline(openFile, line);
00087                         size_t findPos = line.find_last_of(',');
00088                         Draw::text(surface, line.substr(0, findPos), whiteColor, 550, posY,
00089                                         24);
00090                         Draw::text(surface, line.substr(findPos + 1), whiteColor, 850,
00091                                         posY, 24);
00092                         posY = posY + 30;
00093                 }
00094                 openFile.close();
00095         }
00096 
00097         this->reDraw = false;
00098 }

00100 void GameOverState::keyPressed(SDLKey key) {
00101 
00102         this->reDraw = true;
00103 
00104         if (this->myScore >= this->lowestPoints) {
00105                 int ascii = this->event.key.keysym.unicode;
00106                 // Only allow A-Z,a-z letters and numbers 1-9
00107                 if ((ascii >= 48 && ascii <= 57) || (ascii >= 65 && ascii <= 90)
00108                                 || (ascii >= 97 && ascii <= 122) || SDLK_SPACE == key) {
00109                         this->saveName += (char) ascii;
00110                 } else if (SDLK_BACKSPACE == key) {
00111                         // Erase a letter in name
00112                         this->saveName = this->saveName.substr(0, saveName.length() - 1);
00113                 } else if (SDLK_RETURN == key) {
00114                         // Save name when press return
00115                         save();
00116                 }
00117         }
00118 
00119         if (SDLK_ESCAPE == key) {
00120                 this->done = true;
00121         }
00122 }
00123 
00124 void GameOverState::mousePressed(const int button, const int mouseX,
00125                 const int mouseY) {
00126 
00127         this->reDraw = true;
00128 
00129         if (this->myScore > this->lowestPoints) {
00130                 if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 400, 350, 90)) {
00131                         save();
00132                 }
00133         } else {
00134                 // Play again
00135                 if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 400, 350, 90)) {
00136                         AbstractGameState* state = new PlayState();
00137                         this->state = state;
00138                         this->state->map->loadFile(this->mapLoaded.c_str());
00139                         // go to start
00140                 } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 100, 500, 600, 90)) {
00141                         AbstractGameState* state = new IntroState();
00142                         this->state = state;
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 }

00150 void GameOverState::save() {
00151         // Write highscore
00152         ifstream openFile(Setting::HIGHSCORE.c_str());
00153         vector<string> lines;
00154         while (!openFile.eof()) {
00155                 string line;
00156                 getline(openFile, line);
00157                 lines.push_back(line);
00158         }
00159         openFile.close();
00160 
00161         ofstream writeFile(Setting::HIGHSCORE.c_str());
00162         int points = 0;
00163         for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= 4; i++) {
00164                 size_t findPos = lines[i].find_last_of(',');
00165                 stringstream ss(lines[i].substr(findPos + 1));
00166                 ss >> points;
00167                 if (this->myScore >= points) {
00168                         writeFile << this->saveName << "," << this->myScore << endl;
00169                         this->myScore = -1;
00170                 }
00171                 if (i != 4) {
00172                         writeFile << lines[i] << endl;
00173                 }
00174         }
00175         this->myScore = -1;
00176         writeFile.close();
00177 }
